message.body: Got it. It was in a completely other building that wasn't marked. Headed back.
I should be OK. other building. That place is definitely on fire though.

Turns out I followed my GPS to the wrong building like a dummy. That was actually one Bala. I got out of there in the nick of time. Shits getting crazy over here. There's police mobilzing everywhere. Like a mad scramble. Glad I dipped out.
